text: Nicole Kidman had some good clean fun with her Big Little Lies cast mates on Sunday evening. The Oscar - winning actress posted a clip on her Instagram stories where she was bowling with Meryl Streep, Reese Witherspoon and Shailene Woodley. The 50 - year - old Australian star, captioned her post,'Sunday night fun with our amazing # BigLittleLies crew.''
